name: SCHOOL PARENT APP
description: Note: This app needs a minimum android version of 7.0. If the app is not compatible with your device, please login through the Parent Portal https://parent.neverskip.com using your Registered Mobile Number.  Parent App - Features:  - Information on Academics, Activities and Attendance in one touch  - Get details of fees paid and also an option to pay directly from mobile  - Access photos, videos of all functions of the school  - Get dose of interesting activities to do with your children in the locality  - Plan for activities from the schools daily calendar  - Real time tracking of school bus  And many more.  If you need help with the app, please email us at mobileapps@neverskip.com  Note: School Parent App can be activated only by the parents who are authorized to access this app.
